mainText:
I am certain 
Mr. Jobs was and will continue to be one of the most brilliant minds of 
this century. A true visionary who made of technology his truest 
artistic expression. His memory will forever live in the hearts of those 
who like me truly believe in holding on to ones ideals. Steve Jobs, my heart is heavy today because of your parting, you 
will always be an inspiration to me as a free thinker, a businessman and 
a true artist.
author: Daniel
